headline: Wasm core dumps and debugging Rust in Cloudflare Workers
keywords: Cloudflare Workers, WASM, WebAssembly, Rust, Developers
description: Debugging Rust and Wasm with Cloudflare Workers involves a lot of the good old time-consuming and nerve-wracking printf'ing strategy. What if thereâ€™s a better way? This blog is about enabling and using Wasm core dumps and how you can easily debug Rust in Cloudflare Workers
